about_the_game:
✨Nekokami: Internship is a FREE prologue to the full game Nekokami. This prologue contains 20+ Expeditions and roughly 4 hours of story-rich gameplay.

UPDATE: Nekokami - The Human Restoration Project is now in Early Access! 🎉 Check out our developer page or scroll down to "More from Rocket-in-Bottle"! 🚀

In this sneak peek of the full game, you will:

  • 🌏 Create beautiful worlds of natural habitats and human settlements with strategic, or spontaneous, placement of tiles in a unique hand-drawn-like art style.

  • 🌌 Follow the beginning of a whimsical yet heart-warming story of Human-Cat friendship, set millennia later in the future.

  • 💼 Earn your place in Nekokami Co., your employer, by creating worlds that beat expectations. Or just relax. Your bosses are Cats after all.

  • 🔮 Befriend a selection of Kami, spirits of the nature and the universe, and see them bring miracles to your work. They are Cats too. What could go wrong?

🌟 Nekokami Co. is commissioned to manage planets all over the universe. That's a LOT of planets! Environment, biomes and rules differ from Star System to Star System. You will get to visit at least SIX Star Systems during your internship.

🐈 I did mention the Kami*, right? Technically the spirits are the real fellows creating the worlds. As a Planetary Architect, you are basically borrowing their Creative Energy for your own use. You will need to seek their acceptance and approval. Through their friendship, you will potentially learn the secrets of nature and the arcane laws of universe.

*Kami is actually a Japanese word that roughly translates to "spirits and gods".

📖 Developer's Note

This game is being created by a pair of nomad developers currently living in Japan.

While the game may remind you of some tile-building favorites, our design goal is to push this relatively new genre further. Imagine, what if a relaxing building experience is now also part of an adventure? What if players can also, along the way, meet and befriend whimsical and relatable (cat)characters?

This Prologue is a fruit of labor of such an idea. Hope you will enjoy it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core (Intel / AMD)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT740M | AMD Radeon R8 | Intel HD 630
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews:
“Nekokami looks like it'll be intriguing for fans of tile-placing games like Dorfromantik, though with a more objective focused set of challenges and puzzles rather than open-ended score chasing.”
PC Gamer

“(Translated) I felt that even the early tutorial-like stages had a sufficient amount of content, but there are still plenty of stages to play and enjoy!”
Indie Freaks
short_description: Architect beautiful, peaceful worlds in a far-future where Cats rule the universe. Befriend sometimes-naughty spirits of nature. Manage Humans. Join us in this unique planet-building adventure and get a taste of the full journey!
